ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: It is nice to use on creatures running away from you, especially if you are encumbered and you don t have your root spell yet.  It is also a nice alternative
ygData.messageBody:
It is nice to use on creatures running away from you, especially if you are
encumbered and you don't have your root spell yet. It is also a nice
alternative for drawing creatures to you from groups instead of using flash
of light. Sometimes using magic can excite an entire group of creatures,
but one arrow won't excite as many of them to attack. It may not be
authentic, but I am trying to practice the skill. Just wish they would have
given us the tiny dagger option to practice with. I will be sending
feedback on that to the gm's.

Grod





From: Clanretri@...

Paladin, well Knights do use Archery in ancient times but in the form of
crossbow strapped to their plate vambrace. It let them to take out other
ranged enemies while charging forward on horse. However the most commonly
used range weapon for knights were throwing lances which i do not think
exist
in EQ:(

Bobaliya of Bristlebane.
